SENT.plain: A 63-year old diabetic man presented with left Weber's syndrome and meningitic syndrome
CSF examination showed moderate lymphocytic pleocytosis and elevated proteins with normal glucose content and sterile culture
Blood cultures yielded Listeria monocytogenes and the patient received ampicillin
While his neurological condition had partially improved, he died of heart failure
Several mesencephalic abscesses were found at autopsy
